summary: Created comprehensive AgentOps debugging tools for the BeautyBooking module. Developed debug-beauty-module-with-agentops.php script that tests 5 known bugs, generates OpenTelemetry traces, and provides detailed analysis. Confirmed Badge Rating Threshold bug (uses > instead of >=). Created AGENTOPS_DEBUGGING_SUMMARY.md documentation and query-agentops-trace.php helper script. All OpenTelemetry traces are being generated and sent to Observe Agent. AgentOps MCP tools are authenticated and ready for trace analysis.
current_status: BeautyBooking module debugging infrastructure complete. OpenTelemetry instrumentation working. AgentOps MCP tools authenticated. 5 bugs tested - 1 confirmed (Badge Rating Threshold), 4 reviewed. Ready for trace analysis via AgentOps dashboard or MCP tools. Next steps: Fix confirmed bug, review cancellation fee logic, and set up AgentOps alerts for production monitoring.
